text:
Sequel | Microsoft Stack developer, devops and testers | Malaga, Spain | ONSITE, REMOTE with some F2F | Full-time

Sequel is a leading provider of insurance software, specialized in the Lloyd's market, headquartered in London, UK. We are recruiting a number of positions for our development hub in Malaga, south of Spain.

We are particularly interested in React as we transition away from Angular.

More details: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/sequel-m%C3%A1laga-we-hiring-....

Feel free to get in touch with any questions recruitmentspain@sequel.com
